title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-20] [$250] [HIGH] [API reliability] Opening a thread calls OpenReport twice
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Break down in numbered steps

1. Navigate to a report that has messages with threads
2. Open Networks tab in the inspector
3. Open some thread
4. Notice that OpenReport for that report has been called twice

Expected result: Describe what you think should've happened

Only one OpenReport should have been called/ executed

Actual result: None
